name: Lost Without You
description:
Lost Without You - Some things are hard to let go. The house is more silent now. But memories are forever. It's time to walk down the memory lane, to find the lost memories. "Lost Without You" is a 2D walking simulator with couple of simple minigames. Touch items to unlock memories.

This game was a part of Global Game Jam 2021, held during January 2021.

It is the second game I have made as a solo developer from start to finish!

Be prepared for some major feels!
